Trustee_11.content: Following the recent rejection of my allocation plan, it is evident that my reputation as a trustee requires significant improvement. This incident, coupled with previous rejections, points to a declining trustworthiness and competence. I must reevaluate my strategies for allocating profits and focus on rebuilding trust with potential investors through consistent and equitable proposals.
